text: Hypopharyngeal Cancer is a type of cancer in which malignant cells grow in the hypopharynx (the area where the larynx and esophagus meet). This type of cancer is rare. Only about 2,500 cases are seen in the US each year.WebMd. Hypopharyngeal Cancer Treatment ==References== Category:Medicine Category:Cancer C Category:Diseases and disorders of the throat
title: Hypopharyngeal cancer
